name: Dan's Racing Gang
description:
In this, you can drive around a bone-shaped racecourse with a friend, using the same keyboard to drive both characters!

Originally an idea we had in mid-2019, I spent the next year adding a few features to this game to make more fun to play. I actually planned to continue this, doing some stuff during Autumn 2021, but it never really went anywhere after the last version you can see below - though you can download the project files to see the extra scene I began to add! My favourite part of this is the two-person view - it's actually two cameras rendering their views onto their respective RawImage UI widget, which is a great bodge.

There's a known collider bug that might allow you to go around the track faster, but I never actually tested if it was - see if you can find it!

- Danakk04
